name: The Vampire's Prisoner
description:
"The Vampire's Prisoner" is a top-down escape game inspired by "Escapists". You are stuck in the dungeon of a Vampire that comes back every Midnight to get some blood - and you are his only source. So try to stay hydrated to get the blood-regeneration running.

Instructions:

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow-Keys / Left Stick on Gamepads
  • Interact: Space / A-Button on Gamepads
  • You are regenerating life if you have Water
  • You can regenerate life by sleeping, but that skips time by 3 hours
  • At 12 o’clock the vampire comes to the dungeon and takes half the life from the bloodbank. If there isn’t enough, you die

--> Find a way to escape the dungeon
